name: VORS: Viking of Runal Stellaries Demo
name_original: VORS: Viking of Runal Stellaries Demo
description:
Hello and welcome to our first demo. This a Viking based RPG game that takes place under the Viking Age. This demo will get you a sample of the movement/ combat system and what type of graphics we are planning to use. Any tips or feedback? Let us know! 

~Keys

Left mousebutton to move around

Space for attacking (Hold or tap)

P.S 

Killing mobs increases both health and damage :)

droplessstudios@gmail.com
